NK041(di)009:1: // rten la rab gnas sgrub pa'i cho ga'i snying po dge legs dpal 'phel bzhugs /
NK041(di)009:2: na mo gu ru many+dzu sh+r+ai ye /
NK041(di)009:3: 'dir rgyal ba'i gsang ba gsum gyi sgyu 'phrul mtshon
NK041(di)009:4: byed rten dam tshig pa la ye shes pa gzhug
NK041(di)009:5: cing brtan pa'i cho ga ni rgyud sde rnams las
NK041(di)009:6: gsungs pa'i don bzhin grub pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis
NK041(di)009:7: legs par bkral ba'i dgongs don ltar rab gnas byed
NK041(di)009:8: pa la / sbyor dngos rjes gsum las /
NK041(di)009:10: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams /
NK041(di)009:11: rab tu gnas pa la basngagasa pa'i dus bzang po dang ldan pa la /
NK041(di)009:12: tshul mthun gyi gnas su dge bar bshams zhing /
NK041(di)009:13: ston 'khor phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor
NK041(di)009:14: bkod cing mchod pa'i yo byad gya noms pa dang
NK041(di)009:15: / rab tu gnas byed kyi rdzas bum pa /
NK041(di)009:17: me tog sogs ji lta 'os pa'i yo byad 'du byas te /
NK041(di)009:18: dkyil 'khor gang la mos pa'i lha yi las gzhung
NK041(di)009:19: tshul bzhin bsrangs te bdag mdun gyi bzlas pa song
NK041(di)009:25: khrus bum brgyad 'adi'ang zur du shes mchan /
NK041(di)009:26: de bcu gcig so sor sgrub pa'am /
NK041(di)009:27: khrus bum lnga'am gcig la khrus spyi khyab du sgrub pa byas kyang rung la /
NK041(di)009:29: gtso bum las bum gnyis kyis 'thus pas bum pa de gnyis bsang sbyang byas la /
NK041(di)009:31: rnam rgyal bum pa'i gzungs thag ser po 'jus nas /
NK041(di)009:32: rin chen bum pa mtshan nyid rab ldan pa //
NK041(di)009:33: bdud rtsi'i chu yis gang ba'i dbus nyid du //
NK041(di)009:34: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams //
NK041(di)009:35: ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chu zla'i tshul du gsal //
NK041(di)009:36: rang thugs sngags 'od gzungs thag la 'khril te //
NK041(di)009:37: bum lha'i rgyud bskul 'od zer 'phro 'du yis //
NK041(di)009:38: don gnyis bsgrub cing sku yi cha kun nas //
NK041(di)009:39: byang sems bdud rtsi'i rgyun bab bum pa gang //
NK041(di)009:41: lha gang yin gyi rtsa sngags la sham bu dbyangs
NK041(di)009:42: gsal rten snying su pra tish+tha rnams sbrel ba ci
NK041(di)009:44: las kyi bum par pad nyir h'u yig las //
NK041(di)009:45: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gsal ba yi //
NK041(di)009:46: sku las rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rdul phra rab //
NK041(di)009:47: yongs su bab pas bum pa gang bar gyur //
NK041(di)009:48: badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK041(di)009:50: a b+hi she ka sogs ci nus bzla /
NK041(di)009:51: mthar mchod cing bstod la yig brgyas nongs pa bshags /
NK041(di)009:52: +aahmh'u gis dung chos kyi chu mchod yon du phul
NK041(di)009:53: bas lha rnams 'od du zhu ba bum pa'i chu
NK041(di)009:54: dang dbyer med gyur par bsams la /
NK041(di)009:55: rig pa'i me tog dor ba tsam gyis bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o //
NK041(di)009:56: khrus bum brgyad sgrub na 'dir bya /
NK041(di)009:57: de ltar sngon 'gro lha bsgom sngags bzlas bum pa sgrub pa gsum song nas /
NK041(di)009:58: gnyis pa rab gnas dngos kyi cho ga la rnam grangs bcu gcig las /
NK041(di)009:59: dang po bgegs sbyang ba la /
NK041(di)009:60: bgegs ga tor bshos bu gsum re re nas rten la bskor zhing /
NK041(di)009:61: sarba sig+h+n+aam na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta sogs brjod pa zhi bas sbyang ba /
NK041(di)009:62: ting lo dang chang bus bskor zhing h'u bzhi'i sngags brjod pa /
NK041(di)009:63: zhi drag phyed mas sbyang ba byas la /
NK041(di)009:65: rang nyid skad cig gis rdo rje h'u mdzad khro
NK041(di)009:66: bo'i rgyal po'i skur gyur pa'i gnas gsum 'bru gsum
NK041(di)009:67: las 'od zer 'phros pas khro bo'i sprin rab 'byams
NK041(di)009:68: dpag tu med pa spyan drangs /
NK041(di)009:69: badz+ra kro d+ha r+aa dza sa pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs kyis mchod /
NK041(di)009:71: 'jigs pa'i h'u sgra sogs kyis bstod la /
NK041(di)009:73: rig pa 'dzin pa bdag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir /
NK041(di)009:74: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten 'di
NK041(di)009:75: rnams rab tu gnas par bgyid pa la bar du
NK041(di)009:76: gcod pa'i 'byung po gdug pa can rnams 'dir ma
NK041(di)009:77: gnas par gzhan du dengs shig /
NK041(di)009:78: gal te mi 'gro na khro bo ye shes kyi
NK041(di)009:79: rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams
NK041(di)009:80: kyi mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ta
NK041(di)009:81: re / sum b+ha ni brjod cing gu gul gyis bdug /
NK041(di)009:83: rol mo'i tsham rngams bcas pas bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
NK041(di)009:84: skabs 'dir rten gyi mi shis pa sbyangs pa /
NK041(di)009:86: zho zan yungs kar gsum gyis bskor zhing me chus sbyangs pa dang /
NK041(di)009:87: bdag dang sbyin bdag gi sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir /
NK041(di)009:88: til me chur dor ba rnams rgyas spros su 'dug kyang /
NK041(di)009:89: bsdu na rtsa ba'i sa bcad gnyis pa bum khrus la yang /
NK041(di)009:90: rgyas par spro na sku gzugs bkru ba'i 'dag chal gyi rdzas ni /
NK041(di)009:95: gan+d+ha mun+da ste 'o ma can gyi shing gi shun
NK041(di)009:96: pa lnga la bshad kyang bod du 'byor dka' bas
NK041(di)009:97: de'i tshab tu ba lu 'om bu lcang dkar /
NK041(di)009:98: shug pa'am tsan dan dkar po'i shun pa lnga yi 'dag chal gyis byugs nas bkru ba dang /
NK041(di)009:99: yang ba byung lnga dang dri bzang sbyar ba dang /
NK041(di)009:100: yang skyu ru ra dang yung ba'i phye ma sogs
NK041(di)009:101: sbyar ba'i 'dag chal gyis byugs shing mnyen nas bkru
NK041(di)009:102: bar gsungs kyang / de tsam ma 'byor na slob dpon kun snying gis /
NK041(di)009:103: sug pa dang ni sran phye dang /
NK041(di)009:104: ku sha ba yi rnam pa lnga /
NK041(di)009:105: de ltar so phag la sogs pas /
NK041(di)009:106: khrus ni bya bar gsungs pa ste /
NK041(di)009:108: d+aurba'i pir tsam ma 'dzom thabs med do //
NK041(di)009:109: so sor ma byas na 'dag chal gyi rdzas rnams
NK041(di)009:110: bsdom pa durba'i shing gi rtse mo brdung gsed tsam
NK041(di)009:112: durba'i pir gyis byug tshul byas la rten rnams kyi
NK041(di)009:113: gzugs brnyan me lo nga la shar bar dang po
NK041(di)009:114: gtso bum thogs la khrus khang bskyed ji ltar bltams
NK041(di)009:115: pa sogs kyis khrus byas rjes /
NK041(di)009:116: badz+ra +aa ba ra na bi shud+d+he s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:118: de nas dril phyis kyi rdzas shun lpags lnga'am sran
NK041(di)009:119: dkar gyi phye mas dril zhing phyi bar byas la
NK041(di)009:120: / sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya bi sho d+ha na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:121: zhes brjod de dngos su bkru mi rung ba la
NK041(di)009:122: dril phyis kyi tshul tsam bya zhing dri ma thams
NK041(di)009:128: ga bur sogs dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i til mar gyis byugs pa'am byug tshul byas la /
NK041(di)009:131: de nas khrus bum brgyad sngar bsgrub yod na /
NK041(di)009:134: 'di ni sbyiin pa'i sogs phyin drug gi tshig bcad bcas tshig bcad brgyad po re re'i mthar /
NK041(di)009:135: so so'i sngags dang bcas pas bkru zhing /
NK041(di)009:139: bsku mnye gsum re sngags tsam gyis bya ba bla
NK041(di)009:140: ma gong ma'i phyag bzhes la mdzad mthar de nas
NK041(di)009:141: de la sogs kyis na bza' phul te /
NK041(di)009:144: de dag gi bar skabs rnams su na chung rnams
NK041(di)009:145: kyis rol mo bya ba dang spos kyis bdug cing
NK041(di)009:146: shis brjod ci rigs su bya'o //
NK041(di)009:148: de ltar ma lcogs na bum rdzas nyer lnga ldan
NK041(di)009:149: pa'i bum pa gcig sngar bsgrub zin nas skabs 'dir
NK041(di)009:150: / khrus kyi khang pa sogs kyi lha skyed la /
NK041(di)009:151: ji ltar bltams pa sogs khrus sngags bcas pas rten
NK041(di)009:152: gyi gzugs brnyan me long du shar ba la khrus
NK041(di)009:153: gsol ba'i chu de slar yang bum par blugs la
NK041(di)009:154: / dur+b+aa'i pir gyis rten rnams la 'dag chal gyi
NK041(di)009:155: rdzas byug tshul byas nas 'di ni khrus mchog dang
NK041(di)009:156: / / sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h'u /
NK041(di)009:157: zhes dang gong gi badz+ra a ba ra na sogs kyi sngags brjod de /
NK041(di)009:158: khrus chu 'thor zhing gzugs brnyan bkru /
NK041(di)009:159: gzhan yang spro na rnam 'joms sme brtsegs 'byung lnga'i khrus sngags sogs bzlas pas /
NK041(di)009:160: mi gtsang ba dang bgegs dang mi shes pa thams cad yongs su dag par bsam mo //
NK041(di)009:161: de nas dril phyis kyi rdzas byug tshul byas te /
NK041(di)009:162: sarba ta th+aa sogs gong gi sngags brjod cing dril phyi bya /
NK041(di)009:163: de dag sku la sogs kyis sku phyi zhing dril phyis kyi sngags de brjod /
NK041(di)009:164: dri bzang dang bcas pa'i til mar gyis byug tshul byas la /
NK041(di)009:165: stong gsum kun tu dri ngad sogs tshigs bcad dang badz+ra gan+d+he'i sngags bcas pas bsku mnye bya /
NK041(di)009:166: de nas de la sogs kyis na bza' 'bul bas 'thus so //
NK041(di)009:167: shin tu bsdu na 'dag chal gyi rdzas sogs med kyang /
NK041(di)009:169: ji ltar bltams sogs tshigs bcad khrus sngags bcas khrus bya zhing /
NK041(di)009:172: na bza' 'bul ba rnams sngags tsam gyis byas pas chog go //
NK041(di)009:173: de nas rten dngos su bkru ba sogs byas pa
NK041(di)009:174: rnams sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol
NK041(di)009:175: bar bya ste / badz+r+aa b+h+aa ba se s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:176: de ltar min yang sngags des bzhugs su gsol la /
NK041(di)009:178: zhes pas cod pan bcings pa'am 'ching tshul bya zhing gdan la drang por bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
NK041(di)009:179: rtsa ba'i sa bcad gsum pa rten bskyed pa ni /
NK041(di)009:182: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi nang du /
NK041(di)009:183: sku rten rnams seng ges btegs pa'i rin po che'i
NK041(di)009:184: khri pad+ma nyi zla brtsegs pa'i steng du las 'khor
NK041(di)009:185: lo gyis mtshan pa las rnam snang dkar po 'khor
NK041(di)009:187: spyan ma dkar mo 'khor lo dang /
NK041(di)009:188: des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK041(di)009:189: glegs bam rnams rma byas btegs pa'i khri pad nyi
NK041(di)009:190: zla bar +aam las pad+ma dmar po +aam gis mtshan
NK041(di)009:191: pa las snang ba mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma dang
NK041(di)009:193: gos dkar mo pad+ma dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK041(di)009:194: phyag mtshan rnams glang po ches btegs pa'i rin po
NK041(di)009:195: che'i khri pad nyi zla bar h'u las rdo rje
NK041(di)009:196: sngon po h'u gis mtshan pa las mi bskyod pa
NK041(di)009:197: sngon po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa dbyings
NK041(di)009:198: phyug ma sngon mo rdo rje dang des yu ba
NK041(di)009:199: byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor
NK041(di)009:200: ba / rin po che'i rgyan sogs rta mchog gis
NK041(di)009:201: btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri pad nyi zla bar
NK041(di)009:202: ba / / s+w+aa las rin chen ser po s+w+aas mtshan pa las /
NK041(di)009:203: rin 'byung ser po rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa /
NK041(di)009:204: yum m+aa ma k+ai ser mo rin po che dang
NK041(di)009:205: des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa dang
NK041(di)009:207: go cha dang rdzas sogs shang shang gis btegs pa'i rin po che'i khri pad nyid zla bar /
NK041(di)009:208: h+aa las ral gri ljang gu has mtshan pa las
NK041(di)009:209: don grub ljang gu ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin
NK041(di)009:210: pa / yum dam tshig sgrol ma ljang mo ral
NK041(di)009:211: gri dang des yu ba byas pa'i dril bu 'dzin
NK041(di)009:212: pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK041(di)009:213: ste de ltar sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK041(di)009:214: kyi rten rigs lngar phyes la so sor bskyed pa
NK041(di)009:216: lnga ka dgos na'ang de ltar bya /
NK041(di)009:217: gzhan yang mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang sogs rnam snang du bskyed par yang gsungs /
NK041(di)009:220: rten gang yang rung ste de nyid sgrub dkyil gang
NK041(di)009:221: la brten pa'i mdun bskyed ltar bskyed kyang rung ste
NK041(di)009:222: / lha thams cad ye shes kyi dbyings su tha dad med pa'i phyir ro //
NK041(di)009:223: rigs lnga po gang bskyed kyang /
NK041(di)009:224: lha de dag zhi 'dzum mtshan dpe'i lang tsho rab tu rgyas pa /
NK041(di)009:225: dar dang rin po che'i rgyan kun gyis brgyan zhing
NK041(di)009:226: 'od zer mu med par 'phro ba'i spyi bor dkar
NK041(di)009:228: thugs kar h'u sngon po rnams kyis mtshan par bya /
NK041(di)009:229: bzhi pa ye shes pa spyan drangs pa ni /
NK041(di)009:230: bdag dang rten gyi lha'i thugs ka'i h'u las 'od
NK041(di)009:231: zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs
NK041(di)009:232: pa thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis
NK041(di)009:234: badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bya /
NK041(di)009:236: ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon sogs kyis tshigs su bcad pa dang /
NK041(di)009:237: ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni dga' ldan nas //
NK041(di)009:238: sprul pa dam pa tog dkar lha yi bus //
NK041(di)009:239: mi pham mgon la rgyal tshab dbang bskur nas //
NK041(di)009:240: gzigs pa rnam lngas 'dzam gling kun gzigs shing //
NK041(di)009:241: glang chen thal dkar stabs gshegs lhun zhugs ltar //
NK041(di)009:242: rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i rigs mchog dang //
NK041(di)009:243: las kyi rigs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
NK041(di)009:244: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams //
NK041(di)009:245: dus 'dir bdag gis dad pas spyan 'dren na //
NK041(di)009:246: rten mchog 'di la byon par mdzad du gsol //
NK041(di)009:247: bdag dang 'gro la thugs brtse'i phyir //
NK041(di)009:248: nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni //
NK041(di)009:249: 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas //
NK041(di)009:250: rjes su brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
NK041(di)009:251: pad+ma ka ma l+aa ya s+t+wam /
NK041(di)009:253: dri med yid 'ong lha rdzas las byung ba'i //
NK041(di)009:254: mchod yon zhabs bsil me tog bdug spos dang //
NK041(di)009:255: mar me dri chab zhal zas rol mo sogs //
NK041(di)009:256: kun bzang mchod sprin rgya mtshos mchod par bgyi //
NK041(di)009:257: badz+ra ar+g+ham pad+yam push+pe d+h+au pe +aa lo ke gan+d+he
NK041(di)009:258: ne wi te shap+da pra tits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa sa mchod
NK041(di)009:259: nas / lnga pa ye shes pa dgug gzhug bstim par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)009:261: badz+ra ang+ku sha dzah zhes nye bar dgug /
NK041(di)009:267: zhes ro gcig du dgyes pa bskyed par bsam mo //
NK041(di)009:268: drug pa rgyas gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)009:269: rab tu gnas bya'i lha rnams kyi gnas gsum du
NK041(di)009:270: 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje la gnas pa'i yi ge
NK041(di)009:271: 'bru gsum gyis mtshan par gsal la /
NK041(di)009:272: rdo rje rtse lnga rtse gsum rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya gnas so sor gtad de /
NK041(di)009:273: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs 'chang ba //
NK041(di)009:274: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi sku //
NK041(di)009:275: gsung thugs deng 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK041(di)009:276: sku yi gsung gi thugs kyi dbyig tu dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)009:277: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa w+aa ka tsit+ta ya badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa ba +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK041(di)009:278: zhes dang de bzhin gsung dang thugs la kha bsgyur shes par bya /
NK041(di)009:279: bdun pa de la dbang bskur ba ni /
NK041(di)009:280: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis dbang gi lha de bzhin gshegs pa /
NK041(di)009:281: rigs lnga yab yum dang sras su bcas pa thams
NK041(di)009:282: cad badz+ra sa m+aa dzah zhes pas spyan drangs nas
NK041(di)009:283: mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la /
NK041(di)009:285: chos sku nam mkha' sogs tshigs bcad kyis bstod nas /
NK041(di)009:286: rdo rje can gyis sangs rgyas la //
NK041(di)009:287: 'gro ba skyob pa'i ched du dbang //
NK041(di)009:288: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar bstsal //
NK041(di)009:289: de ltar 'di la'ang stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)009:290: zhes gsol ba btab pas nam mkha' gang ba'i de
NK041(di)009:291: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i dgongs pa
NK041(di)009:292: mdzad / yum rnams kyis bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur //
NK041(di)009:293: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bkra shis pa'i glu dbyangs brjod /
NK041(di)009:294: lha mo rnams kyi gdugs dang ba dan la sogs
NK041(di)009:295: pa bsgrengs shing rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas mchod
NK041(di)009:297: khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bskrad pa'i las mdzad par bsam la /
NK041(di)009:298: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas /
NK041(di)009:299: kun gyi bdag nyid rigs kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK041(di)009:300: ma lus sems can bskyed mdzad bde ba chen po ste /
NK041(di)009:301: des ni deng khyod dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /
NK041(di)009:304: de bzhin bdag gis dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)009:305: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a b+hi she ka te sa ma ya sh+r+ai ye h'u /
NK041(di)009:306: zhes dbang bskur bas sku gang dri ma dag chu'i
NK041(di)009:307: lhag ma spyi bor 'khyil ba las rnam snang sogs
NK041(di)009:308: rigs kyi bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lngas dbu rgyan
NK041(di)009:309: par bsam / h'u tram h+r+ai +aahpany+tsa ku la mu ku ta a b+hi sh+ainy+tsa mam /
NK041(di)009:310: zhes dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur /
NK041(di)009:311: tum zhes go bgo badz+ra tush+ya ho /
NK041(di)009:312: zhes thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
NK041(di)009:314: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sogs tshigs bcad sngags
NK041(di)009:315: bcas kyis mchod pa dang chos sku nam mkha' sogs
NK041(di)009:317: brgyad pa spyan dbye ba ni /
NK041(di)009:318: gser thur gyis dbye ba'i tshul dang bcas /
NK041(di)009:319: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
NK041(di)009:320: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
NK041(di)009:321: rgyal ba rnams la ye shes spyan //
NK041(di)009:322: sems can don du dbye bar bya //
NK041(di)009:323: tsak+shu tsak+shu sa man+ta tsak+shu bi sho d+ha ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:324: d+h+y+aa na sa m+aa d+hi p+r+ai na ne s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:325: spyan 'byed sngags rjes rab gnas rgyud na sngags 'di 'dug dpyad /
NK041(di)009:326: thugs ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs basngagasa sam snyam /
NK041(di)009:327: ye shes kyi spyan rnam par dag pa dang ldan
NK041(di)009:328: zhing sems can gyi don la gzigs pa 'jug pa'i
NK041(di)009:329: mthu phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur
NK041(di)009:330: cig / zhes brjod rgyas par spro na rna brud kyis snyan dbye ba /
NK041(di)009:331: rmang tsher gyis shangs dbye ba /
NK041(di)009:332: thur ma thogs te zhal dbye ba /
NK041(di)009:333: tshems shing gis tshems dbye ba'i tshigs bcad so so'i
NK041(di)009:334: sngags bcas brjod cing skye mched gsal ba'i rten 'brel
NK041(di)009:335: 'dod yon lnga'i mchod pa'ang bya bar gsungs /
NK041(di)009:336: mdor na sku gzugs de nyid rnam kun mchog ldan
NK041(di)009:337: gyi sku 'gro ba'i don la gzigs pa 'jug pa'i
NK041(di)009:338: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par mos par
NK041(di)009:339: bya'o // dgu pa rten bsgyur ba ni /
NK041(di)009:340: slob dpon gyis rdo rje bcas pa'i thal mos rten
NK041(di)009:341: gyi gzugs brnyan me long ngos su shar ba la
NK041(di)009:342: reg cing se gol gyis sgras mtshon pas /
NK041(di)009:344: zhes lan gsum brjod pa sa /
NK041(di)009:345: bskyed pa'i lha yongs su gyur pa las rten so
NK041(di)009:346: so'i snang brnyan gsal la ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs
NK041(di)009:347: pa'i mthu byin dang ldan par gyur par bsam /
NK041(di)009:348: bcu pa mnga' dbul la bzhi las /
NK041(di)009:349: dang po spyir mchod bstod kyis mnga' dbul ba ni /
NK041(di)009:350: mchod pa byin rlabs sngon du 'gro bas nyer spyod kyi mchod /
NK041(di)009:352: chu dang thang las skyes sogs rab gnas rgyud kyi mchod pa'i tshigs bcad dang /
NK041(di)009:355: rig ma bcu drug rnams rgyas bsdus kyi tshigs bcad ci rigs pas mchod /
NK041(di)009:356: gzhan yang rgyud sde gong ma 'brel ba'i cho ga
NK041(di)009:357: yin na sman rag gtor gsum sogs nang dang gsang
NK041(di)009:358: mchod dang tshogs mchod kyang phul bar bya'o //
NK041(di)009:359: bstod pa ni rgyas bsdus ci rigs dang /
NK041(di)009:360: mnyam med mas bstod par bya'o //
NK041(di)009:361: gnyis pa bye brag nyer mkho'i mnga' dbul la /
NK041(di)009:365: stong gsum kun tu na bza' sna tshogs dbang po'i /
NK041(di)009:366: rgyan 'bul ba rgyal ba mtshan dpe'i bzhi rgyas bsdus ci rigs byas pas chog la /
NK041(di)009:367: skabs 'dir rgyan nam yo byad kyi bye brag rgyas spros su /
NK041(di)009:368: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla bre dang //
NK041(di)009:369: dar 'phan rol mo mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs bcas //
NK041(di)009:370: bkra shis rdzas rtags brgyad sogs sna tshogs rdzas //
NK041(di)009:371: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'bul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)009:372: 'breg spyad chos gos chu tshag lhung bzed sogs //
NK041(di)009:373: chags bral rnams kyi nyer mkho ji snyed dang //
NK041(di)009:374: so mang khab snyung gri gu chu gri sogs //
NK041(di)009:375: chags bcas tshul 'chang rnams kyi yo byad dang //
NK041(di)009:376: dur khrod rgyan dang gdan khri me dpung sogs //
NK041(di)009:377: khro bo mnyes byed drag po'i 'dod yon tshogs //
NK041(di)009:378: khri dang na bza' glegs shing glegs thag sogs /
NK041(di)009:379: gsung rten glegs bam rnams kyi yo byad dang //
NK041(di)009:380: srog shing 'khor lo cod pan 'phan dang gdugs //
NK041(di)009:381: rgyal mtshan me tog phreng ba gdan khri sogs //
NK041(di)009:382: mchod rten rnams la 'os pa'i yo byad bcas //
NK041(di)009:383: rnam mang mchod pa'i sprin phung dbul bar bgyi //
NK041(di)009:384: zhes pa 'di tsam gyis phul bar mos pa bya /
NK041(di)009:385: spro na so so'i tshigs bcad rab gnas kyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams las 'byung ba ltar bya /
NK041(di)009:386: 'di dag sku gsung thugs rten yongs rdzogs kyi gtsug
NK041(di)009:387: lag khang lta bu'i rab gnas kyi skabs su de
NK041(di)009:388: ltar mdzad cing ma byas kyang chad skyon med /
NK041(di)009:389: gong gi mchod pa thams cad bsdu na /
NK041(di)009:390: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul te //
NK041(di)009:391: kun tu bzang po bla med mchod sprin gyis //
NK041(di)009:392: mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya cher yongs bkod de //
NK041(di)009:393: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtshos mchod //
NK041(di)009:394: +aa nut+ta ra p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:396: gsum pa ts+aa ru'i zhal zas kyi mnga' dbul ba ni /
NK041(di)009:397: rgyas par sbyin sreg dang 'o thug 'bul ba ni /
NK041(di)009:398: rab tu gnas bya'i rten dang nye bar 'tsham par /
NK041(di)009:399: rgyas par thab khung du rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg rgyas
NK041(di)009:400: bsdus ci rigs byas la de'i tshe der bskyed pa'i
NK041(di)009:401: lha rnams la rab tu gnas par byas pa'i lha
NK041(di)009:402: rnams spyan drangs nas sbyin sreg gi mchod pa 'bul
NK041(di)009:403: / grub nas gshegs gsol dus rten rnams la slar bcug /
NK041(di)009:404: lhar sbyin sreg grub pa'i thab kyi me de nyid las /
NK041(di)009:405: lcags thab lta bu'i steng du 'bras dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi ka ra bcas pa /
NK041(di)009:406: slob dpon gyis blugs gzar gyis dkrugs shing bskol la /
NK041(di)009:407: dpon slob kun gyis lha yi rtsa sngags bzla bzhin
NK041(di)009:408: 'o thug legs par bskol ba'i phud tsa ru'i bza'
NK041(di)009:409: bar lha la phul ba'i lhag ma mchod yon kun
NK041(di)009:410: la 'og gi yon bdag bsgo ba'i skabs su zhal
NK041(di)009:411: bsro'i tshul du bstab par bya ba yin no //
NK041(di)009:412: de ltar sbyin sreg dang 'o thug bskol ba ma grub na /
NK041(di)009:413: lha bshos gtsang ma zas sna bzang dgus bskor ba bshams pa dbul bas chog /
NK041(di)009:414: de gnyis gang ltar yang chab bran la nam mkha'
NK041(di)009:415: mdzod kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas
NK041(di)009:416: / rin po che las grub pa'i snod yangs shing
NK041(di)009:417: rgya che ba'i nang du lha rdzas kyi zhal zas
NK041(di)009:418: 'dod yon gyi ngo bo zad mi shes pa bdud
NK041(di)009:419: rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur par bsam la /
NK041(di)009:420: zhal zas ro brgya ldan zhing yid 'phrog pa /
NK041(di)009:421: legs sbyar 'di ni rgyal ba sras bcas la //
NK041(di)009:422: dad pas phul bas 'gro ba 'di dag kun //
NK041(di)009:423: 'byor ldan ting 'dzin zas la spyod par shog /
NK041(di)009:425: sngar tshogs mchod phul zin na skabs 'dir tshogs la rol /
NK041(di)009:426: rdo rje'i glu gar kyang spro na bya'o //
NK041(di)009:427: bzhi pa sngags kyis mnga' dbul ba ni /
NK041(di)009:428: rten rnams la gzungs thag btags pa'i sne nas slob dpon gyis bzung ste /
NK041(di)009:429: rab tu gnas bya'i rten rnams kyi thugs kar zla
NK041(di)009:430: ba la gnas pa'i sngags 'phreng 'khor ba'i 'od kyis
NK041(di)009:431: phyog bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rten so
NK041(di)009:432: so'i rnam par byon nas de la bzhugs par gyur
NK041(di)009:434: bdag bskyed kyi snying po'i mthar /
NK041(di)009:438: h'u h+r+aihmachoda rten dang gtsug lag khang la /
NK041(di)009:439: b+h+au kham badz+ri ha ba dri d+ha tish+tha b+h+r+au kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)009:441: pusti la sngags gnyis ka dang /
NK041(di)009:442: rten 'brel snying po rnams ci nus bzla zhing /
NK041(di)009:443: thams cad la thun mong du /
NK041(di)009:444: sngar sgrub pa'i gzung bum gyi chu rten snying bzla bzhin me tog la bran pas rten dang /
NK041(di)009:445: 'dus pa thams cad la khyab par 'thor zhing /
NK041(di)009:446: phun sum tshogs pa sogs bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad ci rigs pa brjod par bya'o //
NK041(di)009:447: bcu gcig pa gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)009:448: yig brgya lan gsum sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)009:449: me tog dam pa sogs kyis mchod /
NK041(di)009:450: de dag basngagasa pa sogs kyis bstod la /
NK041(di)009:451: rten la me tog gi phreng ba btags pa nas bzung ba'am /
NK041(di)009:452: me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
NK041(di)009:453: ji srid sa chu me dang ni //
NK041(di)009:454: rlung gi bskal pas 'jig bar du //
NK041(di)009:455: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK041(di)009:456: bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par mdzod //
NK041(di)009:457: 'dir ni gzugs dang lhan cig tu //
NK041(di)009:458: 'gro ba'i don du bzhugs nas kyang //
NK041(di)009:459: nad med tshe dang dbang phyug dang //
NK041(di)009:460: mchog rnams legs par stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)009:462: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang sogs kyis gsol ba btab la /
NK041(di)009:463: las sngags bzla zhing rdo rje bcas lag g.yas kyis /
NK041(di)009:464: sku sogs kyis stod smad bar gsum du bskor la /
NK041(di)009:465: rten snying bzlas pa'i me tog 'thor bas byin rlabs shin tu brtan par bya zhing /
NK041(di)009:466: rjes su mchod bstod kyang bya'o //
NK041(di)009:467: gsum pa rjes kyi bya ba la drug las /
NK041(di)009:468: dang po gtor ma gtong ba ni /
NK041(di)009:469: nang du rdo rje'i chos srung rnams dang phyi rol tu phyogs skyong 'byung gtor ci rigs pa gtong /
NK041(di)009:470: gnyis pa srung ma bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)009:471: gnas dang rten de srung ma gang la gtod par
NK041(di)009:472: 'dod pa de'i gtor ma zur du bshams nas phul
NK041(di)009:473: la / rdo rje bka' nan gyi rgya bcings te /
NK041(di)009:476: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rgya srung me de'i spyi bor bzhag pa'i mos pas /
NK041(di)009:477: badz+ra sa ma ya ha na ha na h'u phata /
NK041(di)009:479: rdo rje chos skyong ba'i srung ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis /
NK041(di)009:480: gnas dang rten 'di rnams srung zhing skyong ba dang /
NK041(di)009:481: mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad
NK041(di)009:482: par 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i don chen po 'byung ba'i
NK041(di)009:485: gsum pa dkyil 'khor rjes kyi bya ba ni /
NK041(di)009:487: bzhi pa yon bdag bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)009:488: bkra shis pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa'i yo byad rnams 'du byas te /
NK041(di)009:489: nye logs su yon bdag stan bzang po la 'khod par /
NK041(di)009:490: bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni //
NK041(di)009:493: zhes brjod cing dpon slob thams cad la ts+aa ru'i 'o thug gam zas sna'i /
NK041(di)009:495: spro na slob dpon gyis lung gi rgyab skyor bcas
NK041(di)009:496: skabs bab kyi bshad pas mtshams sbyar ba'am gang ltar
NK041(di)009:497: yang / khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i //
NK041(di)009:498: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
NK041(di)009:499: ji ltar gsungs pa ji bzhin du //
NK041(di)009:500: de dag don ni ngas byas te //
NK041(di)009:501: de rnams don ni grub zin gyi //
NK041(di)009:502: ci bde bar ni mchod par byos //
NK041(di)009:503: khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba btab pa'i rab
NK041(di)009:504: tu gnas pa de legs par tshang bar byas kyi
NK041(di)009:505: khyod kyis rten 'di rnams la zhag bdun du mchod
NK041(di)009:506: pa rgya chen po gyis shig /
NK041(di)009:507: de nas yang ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad par gyis shig /
NK041(di)009:509: des kyang de ltar bgyid pa'i 'dun pas skabs der
NK041(di)009:510: rten gyi drung du mchod pa'i bye brag rnams lag
NK041(di)009:511: gis bstar te bkod pas mdzes par bshams la /
NK041(di)009:512: dpon slob rnams mgrin gcig par mchod pa rnam bsang sbyang byin rlabs sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)009:513: rab 'byams rgya mtsho sogs tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag
NK041(di)009:514: rgyar bcas pas ji ltar rigs par 'bul bar bya'o
NK041(di)009:515: // lnga pa shis par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)009:516: sbyang ba gsum sngar bzhin la /
NK041(di)009:518: deng 'dir rab tu gnas par byas pa'i rten rnams dang /
NK041(di)009:519: sbyin pa'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa'i bkra shis
NK041(di)009:520: dang mthun rkyen bsod nams kyi legs tshogs spel ba
NK041(di)009:521: la bar du gcod cing glags lta ba'i 'byung po
NK041(di)009:522: sogs sbyar ba sngon du 'gro bas /
NK041(di)009:526: stong pa'i ngang las sbyin pa'i bdag po skad cig
NK041(di)009:527: gis gnod sbyin yongs kyi sde dpon dzam b+ha la'i
NK041(di)009:528: skur gyur pa'i mdun du mam las byung ba'i bkra
NK041(di)009:529: shis pa'i rdzas brgyad so so'i las sgrub pa la
NK041(di)009:530: thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan par gyur
NK041(di)009:533: me long ye shes rgya mtsho chen po ste /
NK041(di)009:534: sogs kyi rdzas brgyad kyi bkra shis brjod cing re re bzhin yon bdag la gtad /
NK041(di)009:535: des kyang blang nas rten la 'bul ba'i tshul bya'o //
NK041(di)009:536: slar yang mdun gyi nam mkhar phyogs dus kyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams dang /
NK041(di)009:537: lha dang drang srong bden tshig grub pa'i tshogs kyis /
NK041(di)009:538: shis pa brjod pa'i glu dbyangs di ri ri sgrogs
NK041(di)009:539: shing me tog man+dara ba'i char chen po phab pas
NK041(di)009:540: dge legs kyi snang bas sa gsum kun tu khyab
NK041(di)009:541: par byas pa'i mos pa mdzod /
NK041(di)009:542: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba sogs shis brjod dang /
NK041(di)009:543: mtshan mor yang rol mo dang gar sogs kyis dga' ston rgya cher bya zhing yon phul /
NK041(di)009:544: drug pa dge ba bsngo ba ni /
NK041(di)009:545: de ltar bsgrubs pas mtshon pa'i dge rtsa rnams bla
NK041(di)009:546: med byang chub du bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par
NK041(di)009:547: bya'o // gal te sngon du sta gon dang bcas 'di las rgyas par 'dod na /
NK041(di)009:548: rten bskyed spyan drangs rgyas gdab dbang bskur mchod bstod
NK041(di)009:549: bar gong bzhin btang nas sngags kyis mnga' dbul tsam
NK041(di)009:550: byas te / 'jig rten 'das ma 'das kyi gtor ma skabs 'dir btang la /
NK041(di)009:551: lha la snyan gsan dbab pa ni pus mo g.yas
NK041(di)009:552: sa la btsugs shing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag
NK041(di)009:553: g.yas kyis spos snod dam spos thogs la /
NK041(di)009:555: zhes brjod pas lce h'u las skyes pa'i rdo rjer mos la /
NK041(di)009:556: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni /
NK041(di)009:557: dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las /
NK041(di)009:558: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar //
NK041(di)009:559: de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig /
NK041(di)009:560: 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas //
NK041(di)009:561: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
NK041(di)009:562: sbyin bdag la sogs don ched du //
NK041(di)009:563: bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni //
NK041(di)009:564: ci 'byor ba yi mchod pa rnams //
NK041(di)009:565: me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig /
NK041(di)009:566: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
NK041(di)009:567: rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol //
NK041(di)009:568: kun gyis 'di la byin rlob cing //
NK041(di)009:569: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs //
NK041(di)009:570: zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab pas gnang ba byin
NK041(di)009:571: par bsam zhing slar yang mchod bstod rgyas bsdus gang
NK041(di)009:572: rigs btang nas / nongs bshags byas la /
NK041(di)009:573: +aahmh'u mu badz+ra tish+tha zhes brjod pas /
NK041(di)009:574: rten la phab pa'i ye shes pa mdun gyi nam mkhar gshegs pa la mchod bstod byas te /
NK041(di)009:575: rten dngos sam gzugs brnyan gyi gnas gsum dri bzang gis byug /
NK041(di)009:576: las sngags zla zhing rdo rjes rten la reg nas /
NK041(di)009:579: wastra h'u zhes kheb ser pos mi mthong bar bkab nas bzhag la /
NK041(di)009:580: cho ga'i las rjes rnams bya'o //
NK041(di)009:581: sang tho rangs dngos gzhi'i nyin bdag mdun gyi cho ga bzlas pa bar btang nas /
NK041(di)009:582: bum pa sgrub pa rnams sta gon bzhin bya ba'am /
NK041(di)009:583: sta gon skabs su grub pa des chog par bya /
NK041(di)009:584: sbyang bkru sogs sta gon skabs ltar bya /
NK041(di)009:585: ye shes pa rnams rten la 'byon pa'i snyan gsan dbab /
NK041(di)009:586: sems bskyed de rab gnas bya ba'i 'dun pa brjod
NK041(di)009:587: pa sngon du btang ba rab chog rgyas pa bzhin
NK041(di)009:588: no // de nas rten bskyed pa sogs gong ltar las khyad med /
NK041(di)009:589: dbang bskur rgyas pa lha de'i dbang chog ltar ram /
NK041(di)009:590: dbang bzhi mdor bsdus byas kyang rung /
NK041(di)009:591: de nas spyan dbye sogs 'jug gi bar gong bzhin las gzhan du med do //
NK041(di)009:592: gal te gong bshad de las bsdu 'dod na /
NK041(di)009:593: bdag bskyed gang rung sngon du 'gro bas las bum bsgrubs /
NK041(di)009:594: sbyang ba nas brtsam rten bsgyur ba'i bar sngon bzhin la /
NK041(di)009:595: mchod bstod dang sngags kyis mnga' dbul /
NK041(di)009:597: bdag bskyed kyi rjes chog rnams bya'o //
NK041(di)009:599: bdag nyid skad cig gis h'u mdzad du gsal zhing bgegs bskrad la /
NK041(di)009:600: lha khrus gsol ba'i chus khrus mdor bsdus bya /
NK041(di)009:601: de nas rten bskyed nas spyan 'dren rgyas gdab dbang bskur mdor bsdus byas la /
NK041(di)009:602: spyan dbye zhal bsgyur mchod bstod gsol gdab bcas kyi mthar bkra shis brjod pas 'grub bo //
NK041(di)009:603: de ltar dam tshig rten gsum gang //
NK041(di)009:604: ye shes rol par byin rlob pa'i //
NK041(di)009:605: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni //
NK041(di)009:606: tshad gyur lung bzhin brjod pa bzhin //
NK041(di)009:607: zhes rab gnas kyi rgyud dang //
NK041(di)009:608: rgya bod grub pa'i slob dpon rnams dang /
NK041(di)009:609: khyad par dge legs 'dod 'jo dang dge legs char
NK041(di)009:610: 'beb kyi dgongs pa gzhir bzung nas don snying por
NK041(di)009:611: dril te rab tshes sna tshogs dbyig ces pa'i bgrang
NK041(di)009:612: bya'i sa ga zla ba'i dmar phyogs rgyal ba gsum
NK041(di)009:613: bar / rgya stod brag dkar gyi dben gnas su
NK041(di)009:614: mi pham rnam par rgyal bas bkod pa 'dis bstan
NK041(di)009:615: 'gro la phan pa byed par gyur cig //
